Trenton.Hertford County, West New Jersey:
Hertford County was either a proposed or a former county in otherwise unorganized territory in West Jersey, known only from one source, a map by John Thornton based on surveys by John Worlidge of Salem.


== Boundaries ==
No full description of Hertford County's boundaries exists. A note on the Thornton map states, "The R: Derwin or Asumpinck is the bounds between the County's of Burlington and Hertford on the Wt side of the line of Partition".
